message: I'm being generous, but I want most of the money.  Take it or leave it!
Let's be reasonable, Alice.  I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor. This round only!
I'm willing to give you a little more, but I still want the majority. This is my final offer.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm dropping my share to 60% to give you a better deal. Accept this, or it goes lower next round!
